input.description:
BMC_AR_System/ServiceNow
If not supplied, default will be taken from module configuration.
Name of the adapter to be used to invoke create Change
Changeinterface to invoke

URL of the target Server.
For AR e.g http://<midtier>:8080/arsys/<ArServer>&

CreateChangeSOAPAction
Sample Value:
urn:CHG_ChangeServiceInterface/Change_ProcessInterfaceData
Name of user to be used for connection to the target.
Password of user to be used for connection to the target.

Comments contain description for the Change Summary field.
If not supplied, default will be taken from module configuration.
Template to be used to create the change
Semicolon separated list of target names assigned to the given job.

Impact of the ticket.
Sample Values:
Please refer Autopilot-OA-Change_Management.

Status of the Change.
Valid Values for Remedy New In Progress Completed Cancelled

Urgency of the ticket.
Sample Values:
Please refer Autopilot-OA-Change_Management.
List of Reconciliation IDs of each CI to be associated with the Task.
ID of the Job
Job name of the job for which this process has been invoked.
Job Type
Detailed description.
Keystore to be used for SSL connection to the target.
Truststore to be used for SSL connection to the target.

Communication protocol
for e.g. http-rpc
Passphrase.
XML, JSON (Default)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="substring(., string-length(.)) = '&'"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(., 'webService=', '${create change interface}')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="concat(., '&webService=', '${create change interface}')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org" xmlns:urn="CHG_ChangeServiceInterface" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" cdata-section-elements="Change_ProcessInterfaceData Summary JobDetailedDescription AdditionalNotes ChangeWorkInfoNotes " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <soapenv:Envelope> <soapenv:Header> <xsl:element name="urn:AuthenticationInfo"> <xsl:element name="urn:userName">$[username]</xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:password">${password}</xsl:element> </xsl:element> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <xsl:element name="urn:Change_ProcessInterfaceData"> <xsl:element name="urn:SourceID"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${host}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:JobID"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${jobid}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:JobVersion"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${JobVersion}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:JobType"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${jobType}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:JobName"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${jobName}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Summary"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[summary]</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:JobDetailedDescription"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[jobDetailedDescription]</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:CIReconIDList"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ciids}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:CINameList"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ci_names}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:AdditionalNotes"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[AdditionalNotes]</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Urgency"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${urgency}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Impact"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${impact}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ChangeClass"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${requestType}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ChangeClassReason"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ChangeClassReason}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ReasonForChange"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ReasonForChange}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:TemplateName"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ChangeTemplateName}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:TemplateID"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${TemplateID}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:LocationCompany"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${LocationCompany}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:StartDate"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${startdate}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:EndDate"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${enddate}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:CustomerLoginID"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${bladeuser}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character01"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character01}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character02"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character02}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character03"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character03}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character04"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character04}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character05"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character05}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character06"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character06}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character07"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character07}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character08"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character08}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character09"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character09}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character10"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character10}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:JobInstanceID"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ScheduleID}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:SiteID"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${SiteID}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ChangeEnvironment"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ChangeEnvironment}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ChangeWorkInfoNotes"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[ChangeWorkInfoNotes]</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:CategorizationTier2"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${CategorizationTier2}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:CategorizationTier1"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${CategorizationTier1}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:CategorizationTier3"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${CategorizationTier3}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ProductCatTier1"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ProductCatTier1}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ProductCatTier2"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ProductCatTier2}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ProductCatTier3"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ProductCatTier3}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ProductName"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ProductName}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ProductModelVersion"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ProductModelVersion}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Manufacturer"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Manufacturer}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Status"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Status}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:StatusReason"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${StatusReason}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> </xsl:element> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="yes" /><xsl:template match="/"><result><xsl:for-each select="//*"><xsl:choose><xsl:when test="contains(name(.), "InfrastructureChangeID")"><xsl:copy-of select="." /></xsl:when></xsl:choose></xsl:for-each></result></xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="yes" /><xsl:template match="/"><result><xsl:for-each select="//*"><xsl:choose><xsl:when test="contains(name(.), "ReturnMessage")"><xsl:copy-of select="." /></xsl:when></xsl:choose></xsl:for-each></result></xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="no" /><xsl:template match="/"><text> <xsl:for-each select="/*/*"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:for-each> </text> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="yes" /><xsl:template match="/"><result><xsl:for-each select="//*"><xsl:choose><xsl:when test="contains(name(.), "TaskID")"><xsl:copy-of select="." /></xsl:when></xsl:choose></xsl:for-each></result></xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Error retrieving change details for change ID:

documentation.description:
This is top level workflow create a change in target ITSM.
Actions performed - 1. Initiate defaults 2. Query Customer Info 3. Query template-id 4. Create Change 5. Associate CIs
